title: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act
context: [ยง551E-62] Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act. This chapter modifies, limits, and supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, title 15 United States Code section 7001 et seq., but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101&copy; of that Act, title 15 United States Code section 7001&copy;, or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that Act, title 15 United States Code section 7003(b). [L 2014, c 22, pt of ยง1]
